================
About tl.testing
================

:Author:
    `Thomas Lotze <http://thomas-lotze.de/>`_ <thomas@thomas-lotze.de>

:Online documentation:
    http://packages.python.org/tl.testing/ and
    http://tltesting.readthedocs.org/

:PyPI page:
    http://pypi.python.org/pypi/tl.testing/

:Issue tracker:
    https://bitbucket.org/tlotze/tl.testing/issues/

:Source code:
    https://bitbucket.org/tlotze/tl.testing/

:Current change log:
    https://bitbucket.org/tlotze/tl.testing/raw/tip/CHANGES.txt

:Support the project:
   .. image:: flattr-badge-large.png
       :alt: Flattr this
       :target:
          http://flattr.com/thing/453077/tl-testing-assorted-tools-for-testing-in-Python
